front.title: IEEE Standard for General Requirements for Dry-Type Distribution and Power Transformers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Electrical, mechanical, and safety requirements of ventilated, non-ventilated, and sealed dry-type distribution and power transformers or autotransformers (single and polyphase, with a voltage of 601 V or higher in the highest voltage winding) are described in this standard.
